readme:
Description
===========

Install pgBadger.

Requirements
============

## Platform:

* Ubuntu

## Coobooks:

* apt

Attributes
==========

See `attributes/default.rb` for default values.

Recipes
=======

default
-------

Launch the "install" recipe.

Usage
=====

Include `recipe[pgbadger]` on systems where you want to install pgBadger.
